page.title: 12VARIETY SHOW.
page.content:
Every year our village gets together and we make{a variety show.}In the show we usually have singing and dancing and comedy acts.The show goes on for three nights on a Thursday, Friday,and Saturday. We usually have a party on the last night.The show is held at the Village Hall in Oreton.The show is held in the month of April.I have been in the show since I was four years old,and I have always enjoyed joining in with the fun.The money raised goes to the Oreton village Hall.The first show was done in Jubilee year 1977.
By Lucy aged 10.
